SKY FORCE
Privacy Policy
Privacy Policy

Our company considers that it is a social obligation to recognize the importance of personal information handled through IT-related business, comply with the law and regulations, and protect customer's information with utmost care. We have established a privacy policy to make all users relieved, and follow this policy to handle information strictly.

1. Use and Provision of Personal Information Our company uses personal information within the scope of predetermined purpose in consideration of business content and scale, and will not use it beyond the purpose. In addition, our company will not provide it without consent of individuals and corporations unless there is a request for disclosure based on law from a institution such as a court and police agency. To do so, our company prepares procedures for handling personal and corporate information to educate employees.
Use and Provision of Personal Information
Use and Provision of Personal Information

Our company uses personal information within the scope of predetermined purpose in consideration of business content and scale, and will not use it beyond the purpose. In addition, our company will not provide it without consent of individuals and corporations unless there is a request for disclosure based on law from a institution such as a court and police agency. To do so, our company prepares procedures for handling personal and corporate information to educate employees.

2. Observance of Laws and Regulations For handling personal information, our company will confirm and comply with the laws and regulations regarding the handling of personal information, related guidelines and other national guidelines, and ordinaces.
Observance of Laws and Regulations
Observance of Laws and Regulations

For handling personal information, our company will confirm and comply with the laws and regulations regarding the handling of personal information, related guidelines and other national guidelines, and ordinaces.

3. Campaign of Personal Information Protection In order to ensure that personal information is handled appropriately and safely, our company have established management system and internal rules as "Personal Information Protection Management System" to educate employees, and to prevent unauthorized access, loss, destruction, falsification and leakage of personal information appropriately. In addition, our company will detect any deficiencies at an early stage through daily checks and internal audits when any failures occur. Then prevent recurrence by investigating the cause and taking corrective measure.
Campaign of Personal Information Protection
Campaign of Personal Information Protection

In order to ensure that personal information is handled appropriately and safely, our company have established management system and internal rules as "Personal Information Protection Management System" to educate employees, and to prevent unauthorized access, loss, destruction, falsification and leakage of personal information appropriately. In addition, our company will detect any deficiencies at an early stage through daily checks and internal audits when any failures occur. Then prevent recurrence by investigating the cause and taking corrective measure.

4. Complaints and Consultaions Regarding the Handling of Personal Information Our company sets up a "Personal Infomation Inquiry Desk" as a reception for complaints and consultations regarding the handling of personal information, and responds without delay.
Complaints and Consultaions Regarding the Handling of Personal Information
Complaints and Consultaions Regarding the Handling of Personal Information
Our company sets up a "Personal Infomation Inquiry Desk" as a reception for complaints and consultations regarding the handling of personal information, and responds without delay.

5. Continuous Improvement of Personal Information Protection Management System Our company regularly reviews the "Personal Information Protection Management System" and strive for continuous improvement in order to realize the protection of personal information in response to changes in our business environment, social conditions, and information technology.
Continuous Improvement of Personal Information Protection Management System
Continuous Improvement of Personal Information Protection Management System

Our company regularly reviews the "Personal Information Protection Management System" and strive for continuous improvement in order to realize the protection of personal information in response to changes in our business environment, social conditions, and information technology.
EQS, Inc.
President & CEO, Daichi Noda
Issued: December 14th, 2009
Revised: June 22nd, 2018
Web Application Privacy Policy
Web Application Privacy Policy

In order to provide Web application "SKY FORCE" (hereinafter referred to as "this application") and the service related to this application (hereinafter referred to as "this service"), EQS, Inc. will request user information, and establish Web Application Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as "this policy") to protect the information we acquired. User cannnot use this service and application if user does not agree to provide user infomation.

This policy only applies to this service and application. This policy is not applied for using the web conference tools which is provided by other company through this service and application since the web conference tool itself is not included in this service and application. Please check
Term of Use
Term of Use
to learn the content provided by this service.
1. The Scope of Policy Applied ◦ Console management system of SKY FORCE ◦ Desktop application of SKY FORCE ◦ Websites which contains SKY FORCE system
The Scope of Policy Applied
The Scope of Policy Applied
◦ Console management system of SKY FORCE
Console management system of SKY FORCE

Desktop application of SKY FORCE

Name of the Provider of the Application That Acquire the Information

5. Existence of External Transmission / Third Party Provision / Information Collection Module This service and application will not send the information acquired externally (except user ID of web conference tool which does not require API integration). This service and application do not have information collection module in it. The user ID of web conference tool will be shared via user's website after user include HTML tag issued by this application and service.
Existence of External Transmission / Third Party Provision / Information Collection Module
Existence of External Transmission / Third Party Provision / Information Collection Module

This service and application will not send the information acquired externally (except user ID of web conference tool which does not require API integration). This service and application do not have information collection module in it. The user ID of web conference tool will be shared via user's website after user include HTML tag issued by this application and service.

6. Termination of Acquisition of User Information Acquisition of corporate and all users information belonging to the same organization as user will be stopped immediately when a user (who has administrative account) applies to stop using this application and service.
Termination of Acquisition of User Information
Termination of Acquisition of User Information

Acquisition of corporate and all users information belonging to the same organization as user will be stopped immediately when a user (who has administrative account) applies to stop using this application and service.

7. Inquiry Desk Regarding the Handling User Information Feel free to contact us if you have any opinions and requests about handling user information of this service. Tel: 042-320-8145 Office Hour: 10 am ~ 12 pm / 1 pm ~ 5 pm (excluding Saturdays, Sundays, and Japanese national holidays) Responsibility: Personal Information Manager, EQS, Inc.
